title: Coronavirus: What’s open, closed — and cancelled — in London, Ont. - Global News
description: Concerns over COVID-19, the illness caused by the novel coronavirus, mean plans have changed all over London this weekend.
content: There s a long list of closures and cancellations in London this weekend as a result of the novel coronavirus pandemic The virus which causes the disease COVID was classified as a pandemic by the World Health Organization after it spread worldwide wit chars
